results.title: Exercise-induced ventricular arrhythmias and sudden cardiac death in a family.
results.text_hl: @SPECIES_9606 @@@Patients@@@ were given @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ and were followed up for 18 months.
